text: This is a season-by-season list of records compiled by Canisius in men's ice hockey. Canisius College has made one appearance in the NCAA Tournament, losing its only game in 2013. ==Season-by-season results== Note: GP = Games played, W = Wins, L = Losses, T = Ties {| class="wikitable"
